summary: This is an inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein dated July 15, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It documents the property in Epstein's possession at the time of the record, including a TRUSCOPE device and a log.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose personal property is being recorded at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Inmate Property Record Created
events.description: A personal property record was created for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York as of July 15, 2019.
An inmate personal property record was created for him on that date.
The property listed includes a 'TRUSCOPE' and a 'log'.
